titleStmt.title: Twelve sermons preached by maister Henry Smith. And published by a more perfect copie then heretofore
titleStmt.author: Smith, Henry, 1550?-1591.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by Richard Field for Robert Dexter, dwelling in Paules Church-yard, at the signe of the Brasen serpent,

notesStmt.note: "Foure sermons preached" and "Two sermons preached" each have a separate dated title page. "Foure sermons preached" has separate pagination and register; "Two sermons preached" has continuous register and no pagination.
Reproduction of original in the Medical Society of London.

place.placeName: Paules Church-yard, at the signe of the Brasen serpent
